name: SpaceShooter (misdake)
description:
A simple & hard space shooter demo. Move with WASD and Hold SPACE to shoot.

Expect it to be really hard, and try to get 5 or 10 kills.

I'm learning to build game engines. This is the game project that drives engine development.
It uses Zdog for 2d vector graphics. Others are hand-written. I implemented very simple particle/animation/sfx/... systems, and prepare for future collision/bone/script systems. It's been so much fun to learn how game engine components work.

Source Code: https://github.com/misdake/zrender/tree/v0.1-dev

Good luck and have fun!
